intro.privacy: By tapping 'Start with Phone Number' you agree to the <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>.

phone.title: Please enter your phone number
phone.titleDescription: We use your phone number only to verify all users in Buddy.
phone.label: phone number
phone.warning: The phone number must start with 010
phone.footer: We do not share this information or display it on your profile.

verification.title: We've just sent a verification code!
verification.label: Verification code
verification.notReceived: Please enter the code within the time limit.
verification.warning: Invalid verification code. Please try again.

notification.title:
Would you like Buddya to notify you
for quick chats with new friends?
notification.description: Allow notifications to help you use Buddya more conveniently!

studentInfo.title: Let's create your unique Buddya student ID
studentInfo.description:
The personal information on your student ID must be accurate
as it will be used to verify each other on Buddya!

universitySelect.title: Please select the university you're currently attending.
universitySelect.description: You can view your selected university information on your Buddyya profile.
universitySelect.label: University Select

name.title: Please enter your name.
name.description: English names are used in Buddyya.
name.label: name
name.footer: Your name will be displayed on your profile.
name.warning: Please Enter your name in English

country.title: Select your country
country.description: Please select the country that will be displayed on your profile.

language.title: What languages do you speak?
language.description: We'll display it on your profile and help you find great matches who speak the same languages
language.maxSelect: You can select up to {{count}} languages

major.title: What are you studying at university?

interest.title: Select your interests
interest.description: Choose your interests and meet awesome friends with similar hobbies!
